items.sentence: Tom lives in Boston with his wife and his three children.
I wanted Tom to understand why he couldn\'t live with us.
Tom did a good job predicting who would win the election.
You can\'t blame Tom for wanting to spend time with Mary.
You don\'t seem to have read the contract very carefully.
What\'s the best thing you\'ve ever gotten for Christmas?
Why haven\'t you told Tom about what happened last night?
I don\'t want you to do anything you\'re going to regret.
Didn\'t you know Tom was going to be in Boston this week?
Do you know what\'s really going on between Tom and Mary?
